snippet: Lucas Black, who is paired with Rickie Fowler in the AT&T Pebble Beach National Pro-Am, is a scratch golfer who portrayed a touring pro in last year’s movie “Seven Days in Utopia.”
abstract: AT&T Pebble Beach National Pro-Am is the one stop on the PGA Tour where celebrity amateurs are the headliners; actor Lucas Black, who is paired with Rickie Fowler in the tournament, is a scratch golfer who portrayed a touring pro in the 2011 movie Seven Days in Utopia.
lead_paragraph: Lucas Black, who is paired with Rickie Fowler in the AT&T Pebble Beach National Pro-Am, is a scratch golfer who portrayed a touring pro in last year’s movie “Seven Days in Utopia.”

headline.seo: Actor Lucas Black Among Celebrities Playing for Real at Pebble Beach
headline.main: Some Celebrities Play for Real, Not Laughs
headline.print_headline: Some Celebrities Play for Real, Not for Laughs
